name: Avatar Flight of Passage
theme: Ride a banshee through the floating mountains and bioluminescent forests of Pandora in this breathtaking 3D flight simulator.
short_description: An immersive 3D flight simulator soaring on a banshee over the world of Pandora.

name: Na'vi River Journey
theme: A gentle boat journey through a bioluminescent rainforest on Pandora culminating in a Na'vi shaman encounter.
short_description: A peaceful boat ride through the glowing forests of Pandora with stunning visuals.

name: Expedition Everest – Legend of the Forbidden Mountain
theme: A high-speed train journey through the Himalayas with an encounter with the mythical Yeti and backward sections.
short_description: A thrilling roller coaster through Mount Everest with forward and backward segments.

name: Kilimanjaro Safaris
theme: An open-air safari vehicle tour through African savannas encountering live animals like lions, elephants, giraffes, and more.
short_description: A safari adventure through 110 acres viewing real African wildlife.

name: Kali River Rapids
theme: A whitewater raft adventure down a raging river with environmental conservation themes—you will get soaked!
short_description: A thrilling river rapids ride through the rainforests of Asia.

name: DINOSAUR
theme: A time-traveling EMV dark ride racing through the Cretaceous Period dodging dinosaurs before the meteor strike.
short_description: A thrilling time-travel adventure encountering realistic dinosaurs in the prehistoric past.

name: It's Tough to be a Bug!
theme: A 3D film featuring Flik from A Bug's Life with in-theater effects celebrating the insect world.
short_description: A humorous 3D show with sensory effects exploring life as a bug.

name: Festival of the Lion King
theme: A Broadway-caliber theatrical celebration of The Lion King with acrobats, dancers, singers, and puppetry.
short_description: A high-energy musical stage show celebrating The Lion King with live performers.

name: Finding Nemo: The Big Blue... and Beyond!
theme: A theatrical musical retelling the story of Finding Nemo and Finding Dory with puppets, singing, and dance.
short_description: A charming stage musical featuring songs and puppetry from Finding Nemo and Dory.

name: Feathered Friends in Flight!
theme: An outdoor amphitheater show featuring live exotic birds demonstrating natural behaviors.
short_description: A live bird show showcasing the beauty and abilities of exotic birds.

name: Gorilla Falls Exploration Trail
theme: A self-guided walking trail through African habitats viewing gorillas, hippos, birds, and other wildlife.
short_description: A scenic walking path through lush habitats with close views of African animals.

name: Maharajah Jungle Trek
theme: A self-guided trail through Southeast Asian habitats viewing tigers, Komodo dragons, bats, and exotic birds.
short_description: A walking path through Asian ruins and forests with close-up animal encounters.

name: Wildlife Express Train
theme: A scenic train ride from Africa to Rafiki's Planet Watch with views of backstage animal care areas.
short_description: A train journey offering behind-the-scenes glimpses of animal habitats.

name: Rafiki's Planet Watch
theme: An interactive conservation station with animal care facilities, petting zoo, and educational exhibits.
short_description: A behind-the-scenes look at animal care with interactive conservation experiences.

name: TriceraTop Spin
theme: A Dumbo-style spinner ride aboard flying dinosaurs with guest-controlled height.
short_description: A gentle spinning ride for young guests aboard colorful dinosaurs.

name: Primeval Whirl (Permanently Closed)
theme: A spinning wild mouse coaster through a time-travel carnival with sharp turns and sudden drops.
short_description: A spinning family coaster themed to time travel—now permanently closed.

name: The Boneyard
theme: An archaeological dig site playground where kids can dig for dinosaur bones and explore fossil exhibits.
short_description: An interactive playground themed to a paleontological dig site.

name: Tree of Life
theme: The park's iconic 145-foot baobab tree with over 300 animal carvings, viewable on walking paths.
short_description: Animal Kingdom's iconic centerpiece with intricate animal carvings covering the trunk.

name: Discovery Island Trails
theme: Scenic walking paths around Discovery Island with animal habitats featuring kangaroos, lemurs, and exotic birds.
short_description: Tranquil pathways with animal encounters around the Tree of Life.

name: Rivers of Light (Retired)
theme: A nighttime water and light show celebrating nature with floating lanterns, projections, and music.
short_description: A peaceful nighttime spectacular on Discovery River—no longer running regularly.

name: Tree of Life Awakenings
theme: Nighttime projection shows on the Tree of Life bringing animal stories to life with magical visuals and music.
short_description: Enchanting projection shows animating the Tree of Life after dark.
